title: Cille Cyklus
subtitle: Interactive storytelling
description: Digital storytelling finals exam project about the menstrual cycle, focusing on emotions, breaking taboos and providing information about menstruation through interactive storytelling. This group project, included a 80 page paper, hand drawn illustrations, animations and a finished product. The 2 month project ended up getting the top grade.
credits: Digital storytelling, interaction design, illustration, animation, javascript

title: Zero Buzz Brew
subtitle: Non alcoholic beer
description: Branding and website for a fictional non-alcoholic beer. The project included designing the beer can, creating a logo, and developing a website to promote the product.
credits: Handdrawn animation, Custom beer designer, branding, webdesign, infographic,

title: Matrix Value CSS tool
subtitle: Web development tool
description: a tool i made for approximating the 3D matrix values of any given plane, by dragging corners of a polygon to fit on top of an image.

title: Radar live
subtitle: Redesigning a concert venue
description: A parallax scrolling site re-design, for the concert venue radar live in Aarhus. The design is mobile responsive.

title: Signal
subtitle: Small game project
description: A very small game made in just a few days, for a school project. It has a fun little audio + visual puzzle, where you click on buttons in a UFO and must enter the right combination. And an original soundtrack, which i made with ableton live.
